REUTERS.UNKNOWN: M F f2326 reute r f BC-mueller-brass-price 06-02 0058

TEXT.TITLE: MUELLER BRASS LOWERS PRODUCT PRICES
TEXT.BODY:
Mueller Brass Co said that effective with shipments today, it is adjusting the price of all brass mill products, except free-cutting brass rod and related alloys and copper water tube and related products, to reflect contained copper values at 73 cents a pound, down two cents.
Reuter
